file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  description: |
    These APIs allow you to interact with HubSpot's Accounting Extension. It allows you to:
    * Specify the URLs that HubSpot will use when making webhook requests to your external accounting system.
    * Respond to webhook calls made to your external accounting system by HubSpot
  title: Accounting Extension
  version: v3
servers:
- url: https://api.hubapi.com/
tags:
- description: Operations to interact with URL settings for an external accounting
    system.
  name: Settings
- description: |
    Endpoints that an external accounting system should call when it has finished performing a task requested by HubSpot.
    _Note that all responses to the callback endpoints should contain a `"@result"` field, that has a value of either `"OK"` or `"ERR'`, which indicates if the response represents a success or failure of the requested task._
  name: Callbacks
- description: Operations to inform HubSpot about some required account details for
    users in an external accounting system.
  name: UserAccounts
- description: Operations to synchronize external accounting system contacts and products
    with HubSpot.
  name: Sync
- name: Invoice
paths:
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/customer-create/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a customer creation request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/customer-create/{requestId}_createCustomer
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResultIdAccountingResponse'
        description: The ID of the created customer.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for customer creation response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/customer-search/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a customer search request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/customer-search/{requestId}_doCustomerSearch
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CustomerSearchResponseExternal'
        description: The result of the customer search request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for customer search response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/exchange-rate/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to an exchange rate request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/exchange-rate/{requestId}_createExchangeRate
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExchangeRateResponse'
        description: The result of the exchange rate request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for exchange rate response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-create/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a invoice creation request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-create/{requestId}_createInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResultIdAccountingResponse'
        description: The ID of the created invoice.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for invoice creation response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-pdf/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the PDF content of a requested invoice.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-pdf/{requestId}_invoicePdf
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoicePdfResponse'
        description: The bytes of the invoice PDF.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for PDF content of invoice
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-search/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a invoice search request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoice-search/{requestId}_doInvoiceSearch
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceSearchResponse'
        description: The result of the invoice search request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for invoice search response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoices/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a invoice get-by-id request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/invoices/{requestId}_getById
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoicesResponseExternal'
        description: The result of the invoice request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for invoice get-by-id response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/product-search/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a product search request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/product-search/{requestId}_doProductSearch
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductSearchResponse'
        description: The result of the product search request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for product search response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/tax-search/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a taxes search request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/tax-search/{requestId}_doTaxSearch
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxSearchResponse'
        description: The result of the taxes search request.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for taxes search response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/terms/{requestId}:
    post:
      description: Call this endpoint with the response to a terms search request.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/callback/terms/{requestId}_createTerm
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the request that this response is for
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: requestId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TermsResponse'
        description: The result of the terms search
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Endpoint for terms search response
      tags:
      - Callbacks
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/invoice/{invoiceId}:
    get:
      description: Returns invoice data for an Accounting account from the specified
        ID
      operationId: get-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/invoice/{invoiceId}_getById
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the invoice. This is the invoice ID from the external
          accounting system.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The ID of the account that the invoice belongs to. This is the
          account ID from the external accounting system.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceReadResponse'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Get invoice data
      tags:
      - Invoice
    patch:
      description: Updates an Invoice by the given ID.
      operationId: patch-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/invoice/{invoiceId}_update
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the invoice. This is the invoice ID from the external
          accounting system.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The ID of the account that the invoice belongs to. This is the
          account ID from the external accounting system.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceUpdateRequest'
        description: The invoice data to update
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceUpdateResponse'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Update an invoice
      tags:
      - Invoice
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/invoice/{invoiceId}/payment:
    post:
      description: Records an payment against an invoice.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/invoice/{invoiceId}/payment_createPayment
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the invoice. This is the invoice ID from the external
          accounting system.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The ID of the account that the invoice belongs to. This is the
          account ID from the external accounting system.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: accountId
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceCreatePaymentRequest'
        description: The payment information
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceUpdateResponse'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Records an invoice payment
      tags:
      - Invoice
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/settings/{appId}:
    get:
      description: Returns the URL settings for an accounting app with the specified
        ID.
      operationId: get-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/settings/{appId}_getById
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the accounting app. This is the identifier of the application
          created in your HubSpot developer portal.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: appId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingAppSettings'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      summary: Get URL settings
      tags:
      - Settings
    put:
      description: Add/Update the URL settings for an accounting app with the specified
        ID.  All URLs must use the `https` protocol.
      operationId: put-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/settings/{appId}_replace
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the accounting app. This is the identifier of the application
          created in your HubSpot developer portal.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: appId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingAppSettings'
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      summary: Add/Update URL Settings
      tags:
      - Settings
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/sync/{appId}/contacts:
    post:
      description: Imports contacts' properties from an external accounting system
        to HubSpot. Import details, including property mappings, must be configured
        previously in HubSpot infrastructure.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/sync/{appId}/contacts_createContact
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the accounting app. This is the identifier of the application
          created in your HubSpot developer portal.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: appId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SyncContactsRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionResponse'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Import contacts
      tags:
      - Sync
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/sync/{appId}/products:
    post:
      description: Imports products' properties from an external accounting system
        to HubSpot. Import details, including property mappings, must be configured
        previously in HubSpot infrastructure.
      operationId: post-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/sync/{appId}/products_createProduct
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the accounting app. This is the identifier of the application
          created in your HubSpot developer portal.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: appId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SyncProductsRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionResponse'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Import products
      tags:
      - Sync
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts:
    put:
      description: Creates an account which contains the information about the account
        in the external accounting system.  This *must* be called after a user connects
        their HubSpot account to the external accounting system, as there is no other
        way for HubSpot to obtain the external account details.
      operationId: put-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts_replace
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateUserAccountRequestExternal'
        description: The external accounting system user account information.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Create a user account
      tags:
      - UserAccounts
  /crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts/{accountId}:
    delete:
      description: Deletes a user account from HubSpot, meaning that HubSpot will
        no longer send requests to the external accounting system for this user.
      operationId: delete-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts/{accountId}_archive
      parameters:
      - description: The ID of the user account to delete.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - accounting
      summary: Delete user account
      tags:
      - UserAccounts
components:
  responses:
    Error:
      content:
        '*/*':
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
      description: An error occurred.
  schemas:
    AccountingAppSettings:
      description: The URL Settings, which defines the URL endpoints that HubSpot
        will send requests to an external accounting application for certain actions.
      example:
        features:
          createInvoice:
            subFeatures:
              invoiceDiscounts: true
              createCustomer: true
              terms: true
              taxes: true
              exchangeRates: true
              invoiceComments: true
            enabled: true
          sync:
            key:
              toHubSpot: true
          importInvoice:
            enabled: true
        urls:
          customerUrlTemplate: customerUrlTemplate
          exchangeRateUrl: exchangeRateUrl
          searchCustomerUrl: searchCustomerUrl
          createCustomerUrl: createCustomerUrl
          searchProductUrl: searchProductUrl
          getTermsUrl: getTermsUrl
          getInvoiceUrl: getInvoiceUrl
          getInvoicePdfUrl: getInvoicePdfUrl
          productUrlTemplate: productUrlTemplate
          searchInvoiceUrl: searchInvoiceUrl
          searchCountUrl: searchCountUrl
          createInvoiceUrl: createInvoiceUrl
          searchUrl: searchUrl
          searchTaxUrl: searchTaxUrl
          invoiceUrlTemplate: invoiceUrlTemplate
        appId: 0
      properties:
        appId:
          description: The ID of the accounting app. This is the identifier of the
            application created in your HubSpot developer portal.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        urls:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingAppUrls'
        features:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingFeatures'
      required:
      - appId
      - urls
      type: object
    AccountingAppUrls:
      description: The URL endpoints that HubSpot will send requests to an external
        accounting system for certain actions.
      example:
        customerUrlTemplate: customerUrlTemplate
        exchangeRateUrl: exchangeRateUrl
        searchCustomerUrl: searchCustomerUrl
        createCustomerUrl: createCustomerUrl
        searchProductUrl: searchProductUrl
        getTermsUrl: getTermsUrl
        getInvoiceUrl: getInvoiceUrl
        getInvoicePdfUrl: getInvoicePdfUrl
        productUrlTemplate: productUrlTemplate
        searchInvoiceUrl: searchInvoiceUrl
        searchCountUrl: searchCountUrl
        createInvoiceUrl: createInvoiceUrl
        searchUrl: searchUrl
        searchTaxUrl: searchTaxUrl
        invoiceUrlTemplate: invoiceUrlTemplate
      properties:
        getInvoiceUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where invoices can be retrieved.
          type: string
        searchCustomerUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where a customer search can
            be performed.
          type: string
        getInvoicePdfUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where an invoice PDF can
            be retrieved.
          type: string
        customerUrlTemplate:
          description: 'A template URL that indicates the endpoint where a customer
            can be fetched by ID. Note that ${CUSTOMER_ID} in this URL will be replaced
            by the actual customer ID. For example: https://myapp.com/api/customers/${CUSTOMER_ID}'
          type: string
        productUrlTemplate:
          description: 'A template URL that indicates the endpoint where a product
            can be fetched by ID. Note that ${PRODUCT_ID} in this URL will be replaced
            by the actual product ID. For example: https://myapp.com/api/products/${PRODUCT_ID}'
          type: string
        invoiceUrlTemplate:
          description: 'A template URL that indicates the endpoint where an invoice
            can be fetched by ID. Note that ${INVOICE_ID} in this URL will be replaced
            by the actual invoice ID. For example: https://myapp.com/api/invoices/${INVOICE_ID}'
          type: string
        createInvoiceUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where an invoices can be
            created.
          type: string
        searchInvoiceUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where an invoice search can
            be performed.
          type: string
        searchProductUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where a product search can
            be performed.
          type: string
        getTermsUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where payment terms can be
            retrieved.
          type: string
        createCustomerUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where a new customer can
            be created.
          type: string
        searchTaxUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where a tax search can be
            performed.
          type: string
        exchangeRateUrl:
          description: A URL that specifies the endpoint where exchange rates can
            be queried.
          type: string
        searchUrl:
          type: string
        searchCountUrl:
          type: string
      required:
      - customerUrlTemplate
      - getInvoicePdfUrl
      - getInvoiceUrl
      - invoiceUrlTemplate
      - productUrlTemplate
      - searchCustomerUrl
      type: object
    AccountingExtensionCustomer:
      description: Representation of a customer in the external accounting system.
      example:
        emailAddress: johnsmith@example.com
        name: John Smith
        id: js-1
        billingAddress:
          country: United States
          countrySubDivisionCode: NY
          city: New York
          postalCode: "10001"
          lineOne: 1 Example Way
        currencyCode: USD
      properties:
        emailAddress:
          description: The customer's email address
          example: johnsmith@example.com
          type: string
        name:
          description: The customer's full name
          example: John Smith
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of the customer in the external accounting system.
          example: js-1
          type: string
        billingAddress:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
        currencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency the
            customer should be billed in.
          example: USD
          type: string
      required:
      - id
      - name
      type: object
    AccountingExtensionInvoice:
      description: Representation of an invoice in the external accounting system.
      example:
        amountDue: 100.5
        balance: 50.0
        dueDate: 2000-01-23
        invoiceNumber: INV-123
        customerId: cust-123
        currency: USD
        invoiceLink: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
        customerName: John Smith
        status: OVERDUE
      properties:
        amountDue:
          description: The total amount due.
          example: 100.5
          type: number
        balance:
          description: The remaining outstanding balance due.
          example: 50.0
          type: number
        dueDate:
          description: The due date for payment of the invoice, in ISO-8601 date format
            (yyyy-MM-dd)
          format: date
          type: string
        invoiceNumber:
          description: The invoice number
          example: INV-123
          type: string
        customerId:
          description: The ID of the customer that this invoice is for.
          example: cust-123
          type: string
        currency:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency of
            this invoice.
          example: USD
          type: string
        invoiceLink:
          description: A link to the invoice in the external accounting system.
          example: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
          type: string
        customerName:
          description: The name of the customer that this invoice is for.
          example: John Smith
          type: string
        status:
          description: The currency status of the invoice.
          enum:
          - CREATED
          - SENT
          - PAID
          - CLOSED
          - OVERDUE
          - VOIDED
          example: OVERDUE
          type: string
      required:
      - amountDue
      - currency
      - customerName
      - dueDate
      - invoiceLink
      - status
      type: object
    AccountingExtensionTerm:
      description: Representation of payment terms that are defined in the external
        accounting system. One of 'dueDays' or 'dueDate' is required.
      example:
        dueDate: 2000-01-23
        name: Net 30
        id: net-30
        dueDays: 30
      properties:
        dueDate:
          description: The due date for payment of the invoice, in ISO-8601 date format
            (yyyy-MM-dd)
          format: date
          type: string
        name:
          description: The display name of the payment terms.
          example: Net 30
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of the payment terms in the external accounting system.
          example: net-30
          type: string
        dueDays:
          description: The number of days that these payment terms represent.
          example: 30
          format: int32
          type: integer
      required:
      - id
      - name
      type: object
    AccountingFeatures:
      description: Outlines the features that are supported by the external accounting
        system.
      example:
        createInvoice:
          subFeatures:
            invoiceDiscounts: true
            createCustomer: true
            terms: true
            taxes: true
            exchangeRates: true
            invoiceComments: true
          enabled: true
        sync:
          key:
            toHubSpot: true
        importInvoice:
          enabled: true
      properties:
        createInvoice:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateInvoiceFeature'
        importInvoice:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ImportInvoiceFeature'
        sync:
          additionalProperties:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ObjectSyncFeature'
          description: |
            Indicates if syncing objects from the external account system into HubSpot is supported for the integration.
            This is a map, where the key is one of `CONTACT` or `PRODUCT`, to indicate which type of object you do or don't support syncing.
            For example:
            ```
              "sync": {
                "CONTACT": {
                  "toHubSpot": true
                },
                "PRODUCT": {
                  "toHubSpot": true
                }
              }
            ```
          type: object
      required:
      - createInvoice
      - importInvoice
      - sync
      type: object
    ActionResponse:
      example:
        completedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        requestedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        startedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        links:
          key: links
        status: PENDING
      properties:
        status:
          enum:
          - PENDING
          - PROCESSING
          - CANCELED
          - COMPLETE
          type: string
        requestedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        startedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        completedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        links:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          type: object
      required:
      - completedAt
      - startedAt
      - status
      type: object
    Address:
      description: Represents an address of a customer
      example:
        country: United States
        countrySubDivisionCode: NY
        city: New York
        postalCode: "10001"
        lineOne: 1 Example Way
      properties:
        country:
          description: The country of the address.
          example: United States
          type: string
        countrySubDivisionCode:
          description: A region of the county of the address.  May represent county,
            state etc.
          example: NY
          type: string
        city:
          description: The city of the address.
          example: New York
          type: string
        postalCode:
          description: The postcode/zipcode of the address.
          example: "10001"
          type: string
        lineOne:
          description: The first line of the address.
          example: 1 Example Way
          type: string
      type: object
    CreateInvoiceFeature:
      description: Indicates what elements of creating invoices in HubSpot is supported
        for the integration.
      example:
        subFeatures:
          invoiceDiscounts: true
          createCustomer: true
          terms: true
          taxes: true
          exchangeRates: true
          invoiceComments: true
        enabled: true
      properties:
        enabled:
          description: Indicates if creating invoices in HubSpot is supported for
            the integration.
          type: boolean
        subFeatures:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateInvoiceSubFeatures'
      required:
      - enabled
      - subFeatures
      type: object
    CreateInvoiceSubFeatures:
      description: Lists the individual aspects of creating invoices that are enabled
        for the integration, as part of the create invoice flow in HubSpot.
      example:
        invoiceDiscounts: true
        createCustomer: true
        terms: true
        taxes: true
        exchangeRates: true
        invoiceComments: true
      properties:
        createCustomer:
          description: Indicates if a new customer can be created in the external
            accounting system.
          type: boolean
        taxes:
          description: Indicates if taxes can be specified by the HubSpot user for
            line items.
          type: boolean
        exchangeRates:
          description: Indicates if the external accounting system supports fetching
            exchange rates when create an invoice in HubSpot for a customer billed
            in a different currency.
          type: boolean
        terms:
          description: Indicates if the external accounting system supports fetching
            payment terms.
          type: boolean
        invoiceComments:
          description: Indicates if a visible comment can be added to invoices.
          type: boolean
        invoiceDiscounts:
          description: Indicates if invoice-level discounts can be added to invoices.
          type: boolean
      required:
      - createCustomer
      - exchangeRates
      - invoiceComments
      - invoiceDiscounts
      - taxes
      - terms
      type: object
    CreateUserAccountRequestExternal:
      description: Information about the account in your external account system.
      example:
        accountId: accountId
        accountName: accountName
        currencyCode: currencyCode
      properties:
        accountId:
          description: The id of the account in your system.
          type: string
        accountName:
          description: The name of the account in your system. This is normally the
            name visible to your users.
          type: string
        currencyCode:
          description: The default currency that this account uses.
          type: string
      required:
      - accountId
      - accountName
      - currencyCode
      type: object
    CustomerSearchResponseExternal:
      description: A response to a search for customers.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        customers:
        - emailAddress: johnsmith@example.com
          name: John Smith
          id: js-1
          billingAddress:
            country: United States
            countrySubDivisionCode: NY
            city: New York
            postalCode: "10001"
            lineOne: 1 Example Way
          currencyCode: USD
        - emailAddress: johnsmith@example.com
          name: John Smith
          id: js-1
          billingAddress:
            country: United States
            countrySubDivisionCode: NY
            city: New York
            postalCode: "10001"
            lineOne: 1 Example Way
          currencyCode: USD
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        customers:
          description: The list of customers that matched the search criteria.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingExtensionCustomer'
          type: array
      required:
      - '@result'
      - customers
      type: object
    Error:
      example:
        message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)
        correlationId: aeb5f871-7f07-4993-9211-075dc63e7cbf
        category: VALIDATION_ERROR
        links:
          knowledge-base: https://www.hubspot.com/products/service/knowledge-base
      properties:
        message:
          description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation
            steps where appropriate
          example: An error occurred
          type: string
        correlationId:
          description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with
            any error reports or support tickets
          example: aeb5f871-7f07-4993-9211-075dc63e7cbf
          format: uuid
          type: string
        category:
          description: The error category
          type: string
        subCategory:
          description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about
            the error
          type: string
        errors:
          description: further information about the error
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorDetail'
          type: array
        context:
          additionalProperties:
            items:
              type: string
            type: array
          description: Context about the error condition
          example:
            invalidPropertyName:
            - propertyValue
            missingScopes:
            - scope1
            - scope2
          type: object
        links:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation
            about the error or recommended remediation steps
          type: object
      required:
      - category
      - correlationId
      - message
      type: object
    ErrorDetail:
      properties:
        message:
          description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation
            steps where appropriate
          type: string
        in:
          description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.
          type: string
        code:
          description: The status code associated with the error detail
          type: string
        subCategory:
          description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about
            the error
          type: string
        context:
          additionalProperties:
            items:
              type: string
            type: array
          description: Context about the error condition
          example:
            missingScopes:
            - scope1
            - scope2
          type: object
      required:
      - message
      type: object
    ExchangeRateResponse:
      description: A response to the request for an exchange rate value. It represents
        the exchange rate from the source currency to the target currency.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        exchangeRate: 1.003
        sourceCurrencyCode: JPY
        targetCurrencyCode: USD
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        exchangeRate:
          description: The exchange rate between the 2 currencies
          example: 1.003
          type: number
        sourceCurrencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the source currency
            of the exchange rate.
          example: JPY
          type: string
        targetCurrencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the target currency
            of the exchange rate.
          example: USD
          type: string
      required:
      - '@result'
      - exchangeRate
      - sourceCurrencyCode
      - targetCurrencyCode
      type: object
    ImportInvoiceFeature:
      description: Indicates if importing invoices from the external account system
        into HubSpot is supported for the integration.
      example:
        enabled: true
      properties:
        enabled:
          description: Indicates if importing invoices from the external account system
            into HubSpot.
          type: boolean
      required:
      - enabled
      type: object
    InvoiceCreatePaymentRequest:
      example:
        amountPaid: 0.8008281904610115
        externalPaymentId: externalPaymentId
        paymentDateTime: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        currencyCode: currencyCode
      properties:
        amountPaid:
          description: The amount that this payment is for.
          type: number
        currencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency of
            the payment.
          type: string
        paymentDateTime:
          description: The datetime that this payment was received.
          format: date-time
          type: string
        externalPaymentId:
          description: The id of this payment in the external accounting system.
          type: string
      required:
      - amountPaid
      - currencyCode
      - externalPaymentId
      - paymentDateTime
      type: object
    InvoicePdfResponse:
      description: A response that contains the PDF of an invoice
      example:
        '@result': OK
        invoice: invoice
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        invoice:
          description: The bytes of the invoice PDF.
          format: byte
          pattern: ^(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4})*(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{2}==|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{3}=)?$
          type: string
      required:
      - invoice
      type: object
    InvoiceReadResponse:
      description: The invoice data stored in HubSpot
      example:
        externalInvoiceNumber: externalInvoiceNumber
        balanceDue: 6.027456183070403
        externalRecipientId: externalRecipientId
        dueDate: 2000-01-23
        isVoided: true
        externalCreateDateTime: 5
        createdAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        archivedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        archived: true
        externalAccountId: externalAccountId
        receivedByRecipientDate: 1
        id: id
        invoiceStatus: CREATED
        currencyCode: currencyCode
        totalAmountBilled: 0.8008281904610115
        updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        externalInvoiceNumber:
          description: The invoice number. Note that this is _not_ the ID of the invoice,
            but the number that the billed customer will see.
          type: string
        totalAmountBilled:
          description: The total amount that this invoice is for.
          type: number
        balanceDue:
          description: The remaining balance due for the invoice.
          type: number
        currencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency of
            the invoice.
          type: string
        dueDate:
          description: The due date of the invoice
          format: date
          type: string
        externalRecipientId:
          description: The id of the customer in the external accounting system that
            the invoice was sent to.
          type: string
        receivedByRecipientDate:
          description: The datetime that that invoice was sent to the customer.
          format: int64
          type: integer
        externalCreateDateTime:
          description: The datetime that the invoice was created in the external accounting
            system.
          format: int64
          type: integer
        isVoided:
          description: Indicated is the invoice has been voided or not.
          type: boolean
        createdAt:
          description: The datetime that the invoice was created in HubSpot.
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          description: The datetime that the invoice was last updated in HubSpot.
          format: date-time
          type: string
        archivedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        archived:
          type: boolean
        externalAccountId:
          description: The id of the account in the external accounting system that
            this invoice is related to.
          type: string
        invoiceStatus:
          description: The status of the invoice
          enum:
          - CREATED
          - SENT
          - PAID
          - CLOSED
          - OVERDUE
          - VOIDED
          - NONE
          - UNPAID
          type: string
        id:
          description: The id of this invoice in the external accounting system.
          type: string
      required:
      - archived
      - balanceDue
      - createdAt
      - currencyCode
      - dueDate
      - externalAccountId
      - externalRecipientId
      - id
      - invoiceStatus
      - isVoided
      - totalAmountBilled
      - updatedAt
      type: object
    InvoiceSearchResponse:
      description: A response to a search for invoices.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        invoices:
        - amountDue: 100.5
          balance: 50.0
          dueDate: 2000-01-23
          invoiceNumber: INV-123
          customerId: cust-123
          currency: USD
          invoiceLink: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
          customerName: John Smith
          status: OVERDUE
        - amountDue: 100.5
          balance: 50.0
          dueDate: 2000-01-23
          invoiceNumber: INV-123
          customerId: cust-123
          currency: USD
          invoiceLink: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
          customerName: John Smith
          status: OVERDUE
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        invoices:
          description: The list of invoices that matched the search criteria.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingExtensionInvoice'
          type: array
      required:
      - invoices
      type: object
    InvoiceUpdateRequest:
      description: The invoice data to update in HubSpot
      example:
        externalInvoiceNumber: externalInvoiceNumber
        externalRecipientId: "152"
        receivedByCustomerDate: 2020-04-01T13:14:15.678Z
        dueDate: 2000-01-23
        invoiceNumber: 'Joe Bloggs #42'
        receivedByRecipientDate: 0
        isVoided: true
        currencyCode: USD
      properties:
        externalInvoiceNumber:
          type: string
        currencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency used
            in the invoice to bill the recipient
          example: USD
          type: string
        dueDate:
          description: The ISO-8601 due date of the invoice.
          format: date
          type: string
        externalRecipientId:
          description: The ID of the invoice recipient. This is the recipient ID from
            the external accounting system.
          example: "152"
          type: string
        receivedByRecipientDate:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        isVoided:
          description: States if the invoice is voided or not.
          type: boolean
        receivedByCustomerDate:
          description: The ISO-8601 datetime of when the customer received the invoice.
          example: 2020-04-01T13:14:15.678Z
          type: string
        invoiceNumber:
          description: The number / name of the invoice.
          example: 'Joe Bloggs #42'
          type: string
      type: object
    InvoiceUpdateResponse:
      example:
        externalInvoiceNumber: externalInvoiceNumber
        balanceDue: 6.027456183070403
        externalRecipientId: externalRecipientId
        dueDate: 2000-01-23
        isVoided: true
        externalCreateDateTime: 5
        createdAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        archivedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        archived: true
        externalAccountId: externalAccountId
        receivedByRecipientDate: 1
        id: id
        invoiceStatus: CREATED
        currencyCode: currencyCode
        totalAmountBilled: 0.8008281904610115
        updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        externalInvoiceNumber:
          type: string
        totalAmountBilled:
          type: number
        balanceDue:
          type: number
        currencyCode:
          type: string
        dueDate:
          format: date
          type: string
        externalRecipientId:
          type: string
        receivedByRecipientDate:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        externalCreateDateTime:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        isVoided:
          type: boolean
        createdAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        archivedAt:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        archived:
          type: boolean
        externalAccountId:
          type: string
        invoiceStatus:
          enum:
          - CREATED
          - SENT
          - PAID
          - CLOSED
          - OVERDUE
          - VOIDED
          - NONE
          - UNPAID
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
      required:
      - archived
      - balanceDue
      - createdAt
      - currencyCode
      - dueDate
      - externalAccountId
      - externalRecipientId
      - id
      - invoiceStatus
      - isVoided
      - totalAmountBilled
      - updatedAt
      type: object
    InvoicesResponseExternal:
      description: A response to a request for invoices.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        invoices:
        - amountDue: 100.5
          balance: 50.0
          dueDate: 2000-01-23
          invoiceNumber: INV-123
          customerId: cust-123
          currency: USD
          invoiceLink: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
          customerName: John Smith
          status: OVERDUE
        - amountDue: 100.5
          balance: 50.0
          dueDate: 2000-01-23
          invoiceNumber: INV-123
          customerId: cust-123
          currency: USD
          invoiceLink: https://myapp.com/invoices/1243a2
          customerName: John Smith
          status: OVERDUE
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        invoices:
          description: The list of invoices that were found for the request.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingExtensionInvoice'
          type: array
      required:
      - invoices
      type: object
    ObjectSyncFeature:
      example:
        toHubSpot: true
      properties:
        toHubSpot:
          description: Indicates if syncing the object type from the external accounting
            system into HubSpot is supported.
          type: boolean
      required:
      - toHubSpot
      type: object
    Product:
      description: Representation of a product in the external accounting system.
      example:
        unitPrice:
          amount: 10.99
          taxIncluded: true
        taxExempt: true
        salesTaxType:
          code: tax-1
          name: Local Sales Tax
        name: Marketing Services
        description: Website design, Online advertising and SEO.
        id: prod-123
      properties:
        unitPrice:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnitPrice'
        taxExempt:
          description: Identifies if the product is tax exempt or not.
          type: boolean
        salesTaxType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TaxType'
        name:
          description: The display name of the product.
          example: Marketing Services
          type: string
        description:
          description: The description of the product.
          example: Website design, Online advertising and SEO.
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of the product in the external accounting system.
          example: prod-123
          type: string
      required:
      - id
      - name
      - taxExempt
      - unitPrice
      type: object
    ProductSearchResponse:
      description: A response to a search for products.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        products:
        - unitPrice:
            amount: 10.99
            taxIncluded: true
          taxExempt: true
          salesTaxType:
            code: tax-1
            name: Local Sales Tax
          name: Marketing Services
          description: Website design, Online advertising and SEO.
          id: prod-123
        - unitPrice:
            amount: 10.99
            taxIncluded: true
          taxExempt: true
          salesTaxType:
            code: tax-1
            name: Local Sales Tax
          name: Marketing Services
          description: Website design, Online advertising and SEO.
          id: prod-123
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        products:
          description: The list of products that matched the search criteria.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Product'
          type: array
      required:
      - products
      type: object
    ResultIdAccountingResponse:
      description: A response to the creation of an entity (eg. invoice, customer).
      example:
        '@result': OK
        id: js-1
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of created entity.
          example: js-1
          type: string
      required:
      - '@result'
      - id
      type: object
    SyncContactsRequest:
      description: A request to import external accounting contact properties in HubSpot
      example:
        accountId: acct-app-123
        contacts:
        - emailAddress: johndoe@company.com
          customerType: CONTACT
          syncAction: UPDATE
          id: acct-app-123
          updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        - emailAddress: johndoe@company.com
          customerType: CONTACT
          syncAction: UPDATE
          id: acct-app-123
          updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        accountId:
          description: The ID of the account in the external accounting system. This
            is the value that will be passed as `accountId` for all outbound calls
            for the user from HubSpot to the external accounting system.
          example: acct-app-123
          type: string
        contacts:
          description: A list of contacts to be imported.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdatedContact'
          type: array
      required:
      - accountId
      - contacts
      type: object
    SyncProductsRequest:
      description: A request to import external accounting product properties in HubSpot
      example:
        accountId: accountId
        products:
        - syncAction: CREATE
          price: 0.8008281904610115
          id: id
          currencyCode: currencyCode
          properties:
            key: properties
          updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        - syncAction: CREATE
          price: 0.8008281904610115
          id: id
          currencyCode: currencyCode
          properties:
            key: properties
          updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        accountId:
          description: The ID of the account in the external accounting system. This
            is the value that will be passed as `accountId` for all outbound calls
            for the user from HubSpot to the external accounting system.
          type: string
        products:
          description: A list of products to be imported.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdatedProduct'
          type: array
      required:
      - accountId
      - products
      type: object
    Tax:
      description: Representation of a tax defined in the external accounting system.
      example:
        code: tax-1
        percentage: 8.05
        name: Local Sales Tax
      properties:
        code:
          description: The code/ID of the tax in the external accounting system.
          example: tax-1
          type: string
        percentage:
          description: The tax percentage.  For example, 8.05 represents a 8.05% tax
            rate.
          example: 8.05
          type: number
        name:
          description: The display name of the tax.
          example: Local Sales Tax
          type: string
      required:
      - code
      - name
      - percentage
      type: object
    TaxSearchResponse:
      description: A response to a search for taxes.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        taxes:
        - code: tax-1
          percentage: 8.05
          name: Local Sales Tax
        - code: tax-1
          percentage: 8.05
          name: Local Sales Tax
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        taxes:
          description: The list of taxes that matched the search criteria
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tax'
          type: array
      required:
      - taxes
      type: object
    TaxType:
      description: Represents a tax in the external accounting system.
      example:
        code: tax-1
        name: Local Sales Tax
      properties:
        code:
          description: The code/ID of the tax in the external accounting system.
          example: tax-1
          type: string
        name:
          description: The display name of the tax.
          example: Local Sales Tax
          type: string
      required:
      - code
      type: object
    TermsResponse:
      description: A response to a search for payment terms.
      example:
        '@result': OK
        terms:
        - dueDate: 2000-01-23
          name: Net 30
          id: net-30
          dueDays: 30
        - dueDate: 2000-01-23
          name: Net 30
          id: net-30
          dueDays: 30
      properties:
        '@result':
          description: Designates if the response is a success ('OK') or failure ('ERR').
          enum:
          - OK
          - ERR
          example: OK
          type: string
        terms:
          description: The list of payment terms that matched the search criteria.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountingExtensionTerm'
          type: array
      required:
      - terms
      type: object
    UnitPrice:
      description: Represents a unit price
      example:
        amount: 10.99
        taxIncluded: true
      properties:
        amount:
          description: The actual unit price amount.
          example: 10.99
          type: number
        taxIncluded:
          description: Indicates if the unit price amount already includes taxes.
          type: boolean
      required:
      - taxIncluded
      type: object
    UpdatedContact:
      description: A request to import external accounting contact properties in HubSpot
      example:
        emailAddress: johndoe@company.com
        customerType: CONTACT
        syncAction: UPDATE
        id: acct-app-123
        updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        syncAction:
          description: The operation to be performed.
          enum:
          - CREATE
          - UPDATE
          - DELETE
          example: UPDATE
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when the customer was updated
            in the external accounting system.
          format: date-time
          type: string
        emailAddress:
          description: The customer's email address
          example: johndoe@company.com
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of the customer in the external accounting system.
          example: acct-app-123
          type: string
        customerType:
          description: Designates the type of the customer object.
          enum:
          - CONTACT
          - COMPANY
          example: CONTACT
          type: string
      required:
      - emailAddress
      - id
      - syncAction
      - updatedAt
      type: object
    UpdatedProduct:
      description: A request to import external accounting product properties in HubSpot
      example:
        syncAction: CREATE
        price: 0.8008281904610115
        id: id
        currencyCode: currencyCode
        properties:
          key: properties
        updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
      properties:
        syncAction:
          description: The operation to be performed.
          enum:
          - CREATE
          - UPDATE
          - DELETE
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when the product was updated
            in the external accounting system.
          format: date-time
          type: string
        price:
          description: The price of the product.
          type: number
        currencyCode:
          description: The ISO 4217 currency code that represents the currency of
            the product price.
          type: string
        id:
          description: The ID of the product in the external accounting system.
          type: string
        properties:
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
          description: A map of key-value product properties to be imported.
          type: object
      required:
      - id
      - price
      - properties
      - syncAction
      - updatedAt
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    oauth2_legacy:
      flows:
        authorizationCode:
          authorizationUrl: https://app.hubspot.com/oauth/authorize
          scopes:
            accounting: Invoice Information
          tokenUrl: https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token
      type: oauth2
    hapikey:
      in: query
      name: hapikey
      type: apiKey
